star.name: Sun
star.description: The Sun is the star at the center of the Solar System and the primary source of energy for Earth.

planets.name: Mercury
planets.description: The smallest and innermost planet in the Solar System.

planets.name: Venus
planets.description: Venus is the second planet from the Sun and has a dense, toxic atmosphere.

planets.name: Earth
planets.description: Earth is the third planet from the Sun and the only astronomical object known to harbor life.

planets.name: Mars
planets.description: Mars is the fourth planet from the Sun and is often referred to as the 'Red Planet' due to its reddish appearance.

planets.name: Jupiter
planets.description: Jupiter is the largest planet in the Solar System and is known for its prominent Great Red Spot.

planets.name: Saturn
planets.description: Saturn is the sixth planet from the Sun and is renowned for its extensive ring system.

planets.name: Uranus
planets.description: Uranus is the seventh planet from the Sun and has a unique sideways rotation.

planets.name: Neptune
planets.description: Neptune is the eighth and farthest known planet from the Sun in the Solar System.

satellites.name: Phobos
satellites.description: Phobos is the larger and closer of Mars' two moons.
